org.no.pages

Class HomeScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.no.pages.BasePage
      • org.no.pages.HomeScreen

  • public class HomeScreen
extends BasePage
    Class represents model of the Home Screen, i.e. first screen that appears after application start
